UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Stapled Anoplin as an Antibacterial Agent
Literature.Author: Wojciechowska M, Macyszyn J, Miszkiewicz J, Grzela R, Trylska J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:90% Cytotoxicity=32 µM,Sheep erythrocytes:62.7% Hemolysis=64 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli MG1655(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli ESBL (MIC=8-16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=32µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium LT2(MIC=32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-1720(MIC=4µM),Bacillus subtilis 168(MIC=4µM)
